basics.name: Gunja Pandey
basics.title: Software Engineer
basics.summary: A results-driven Software Engineer specializing in the design and optimization of high-throughput, enterprise-grade applications using Java and Spring Boot. With two years of hands-on experience, my focus has been on architecting scalable solutions, resolving critical production challenges, and elevating code quality standards, consistently driving significant improvements in system reliability and user experience. I am currently pursuing a Master's in Computer Science at University College Dublin.

experience.title: Software Engineer-II
highlights: Resolved 50+ production issues and integrated secure RESTful APIs, significantly improving system reliability and customer experience.
Optimized the Motor Insurance journey by integrating Signzy APIs, resulting in a 33% reduction in costs and enhanced overall efficiency.
Collaborated on high-level design, performed in-depth code reviews, and documented the insurance journey with Structizr DSL, ensuring high scalability and maintainability.

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern
highlights: Enhanced the Pocket insurance journey by implementing 5 new features and resolving 20+ bugs, leading to a 15% increase in user task completion rate and a 25% reduction in defect rate.
Improved code quality using SonarQube to cut bugs by 90% and code smells by 80%.
Consistently completed 100% of assigned user stories within sprint deadlines, improving delivery efficiency.

education.summary: Specializing in advanced topics relevant to enterprise architecture and scalable systems.
education.coursework: Relevant Coursework: Advanced Software Engineering, Cloud Computing, Content Based Image and Video Retrieval.

education.degree: Bachelor of Computer Science and Engineering

projects.name: Vehicle Detection, Classification and Counting
highlights: Implemented Gaussian Mixture Modeling (GMM) for precise classification of vehicles into different categories, ensuring accurate data collection.
Employed background subtraction techniques to filter noise from video streams, enhancing the reliability of object detection.
Integrated real-time tracking with object labeling, bounding box, and center extraction to monitor vehicle movement and generate crucial traffic flow statistics.

projects.name: ML Regression for Supermarket Sales Prediction
projects.tech: Tech: Python, Scikit-learn, Pandas (Published at SCRS Conference)
highlights: Conducted a Performance Comparison of ML Regression Algorithms (e.g., Linear Regression, Random Forest, SVR) to identify the most accurate model for sales forecasting.
Analyzed diverse dataset features, including item visibility, store type, and establishment year, resulting in improved predictive accuracy for inventory and supply chain management.
Pre-processed and engineered features to optimize model input, achieving key insights into sales drivers.

leadership.title: Chairperson IEEE Women in Engineering
leadership.summary: Oversaw society management and mentorship programs, successfully driving a 20% rise in female tech event participation and engagement.

leadership.title: Head of Curation, TEDx VIT Chennai
leadership.summary: Organized and conducted meetings with speakers and performers, helping them in finalizing scripts and ensuring high-quality content for TEDx events.

leadership.title: Head of Public Relations, IEEE Computer Society
leadership.summary: Responsible for securing sponsorships, marketing initiatives, and managing social media handles to boost club visibility and funding.

leadership.title: Chief Editor, The Capsule Magazine
leadership.summary: Supervised the selection of articles, removal of grammatical errors and plagiarism, and planned publication content for the university newsletter.

achievements.title: BFDL Documentation Contest Winner
achievements.summary: Awarded for comprehensive Pocket Insurance journey documentation using Structurizr DSL, recognized for clarity, scalability, and impact on team onboarding and maintenance.

achievements.title: Walmart CodeHers 2022
achievements.summary: Shortlisted in the first list of top performers among over 42,000+ candidates, demonstrating top-tier competitive programming skills.

contact.summary: I'm currently based in Dublin and always open to discussing new opportunities in software engineering, system design, and large-scale applications.
